src:
NBA VEČERAS: Lejkersi slave u Čikagu, Orlando u minus, Lav i Brogdon u plus
Šta vi mislite?

05 Nov 2019




ČIKAGO BULS – LOS ANĐELES LEJKERS (tip 2, kvota 1,40)



Čikago je jedno od najvećih razočaranja ove sezone. Nismo očekivali od Bulsa da se bore za vrh Istoka, ali jesmo mnogo bolju igru od onoga što smo videli na početku sezone. Umesto da se bore za plej-of, ako ovako nastave, Bulsi će se boriti za još jedan visoki pik na draftu. Lejkersi su s druge strane sasvim dobro ušli u sezonu, Entoni Dejvis i Lebron Džejms dobro funkcionišu zajedno, a uvek dobiju još nekoga ko im se priključi za pobedu. Kako Čikago igra veoma lošu obranu, tako jednostavno ne vidimo kako bi mogli da zaustave takve fizički jake igrače poput “Kralja” i “Obrve”.


ORLANDO MEDŽIK (broj poena (100,5), tip manje, kvota 1,85)


Od početka sezone pratimo broj poena pojedinih ekipa, a uzorak od šest utakmica je sasvim dovoljan da vam predložimo ovu opkladu. Naime, Orlando niti jednom nije ubacio 100 poena u dosadašnjim utakmicama, u svakoj je prošla opklada “manje”, a kada se zna da je Oklahoma svaki put svog protivnika ostavila na manje poena od granice, onda se ovo jednostavno mora odigrati.



KEVIN LAV (broj poena (19,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)



Kevin Lav je dobro ušao u sezonu – trenutno je ne proseku od 19,2 poena, 15,3 skokova i 4,3 asistencije u 49,3% šuta i sjajnih 41,3% za tri. U poslednje dve utakmice prosek poena je još veći – 25,5 poena, a noćas bi Lav mogao da nastavi u dobrom ritmu jer Klivlend igra protiv Bostona koji je sigurno bolja ekipa, ali koji ima velikih problema s odbranom na visokim igračima. Lava bi trebalo da čuvaju Gordon Hejvord ili Džejson Tejtum, a nijedan od njih fizički ne bi trebalo toliko da ga uspori da ne pređe ovu granicu.




MALKOLM BROGDON (broj poena (21,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)




Još jedan igrač koji je odlično ušao u sezonu je Malkolm Brogdon. On je na proseku od 22,5 poena, 9,7 asistencija i 5,3 skokova pa je odmah pokazao da će biti pojačanje za Indijanu. Najbolje od svega je što Brogdon može bolje – procenat šuta mu je na 46,9%, a za tri je 34,5%. To su svakako dobre brojke, ali on je lani imao sezonu od 50,5% šuta i 42,6% za tri. Noćas Pejsersi igraju protiv Šarlota. Mogla bi to biti utakmice brzog tempa s dosta poena gde bi Brogdon trebalo da opet ode u plus.


SERIJE


Šarlot u poslednje tri utakmice prima manje poena od postavljene granice. Doduše, bilo je to na gostovanjima, a i granica je bila viša od današnje koja je 109,5 poena. Indijana je od šest dosadašnjih utakmica samo dva puta postigla 110 ili više poena. Pejsersi su takođe u seriji, od četiri utakmice, u kojima su primili manje poena od granice. Tri puta su njihovi protivnici ostali ispod 100 poena, granica je danas 107,5, a Šarlot je više od toga ubacio samo dva puta na šest utakmica. Tri puta je ostao ispod 100 ubačenih poena.
Pomenuli smo u tipu za opkladu na Orlando, ali ponovimo još jednom – tim Stiva Kliforda nijednom u prvih šest utakmica sezone nije postigao više poena od postavljene granice. Niti je makar jednom došao bar do 100 poena. Svaka njihova utakmica je išla i u manje ukupnih poena. Oklahoma nije niti jednom dozvolila protivnicima da postignu više poena od postavljene granice. Ne postižu ni oni previše, dva puta su probili granicu u šest mečeva, a tek jedna njihova utakmica je otišla u više ukupnih poena.

NBA

text:
NBA Tonight: Lakers celebrate in Chicago, Orlando minus, Lion and Brogdon plus
What do you think?

05 Nov 2019




CHICAGO BULS - LOS ANGELES LAKERS (tip 2, odds 1,40)



Chicago is one of the biggest disappointments this season. We didn't expect the Bulls to fight for the top of the East, but we're a much better game than what we saw at the start of the season. Instead of fighting for the playoffs, if they continue like this, the Bulls will fight for another high point in the draft. The Lakers, on the other hand, have entered the season quite well, Anthony Davis and Lebron James working well together, always getting someone else to join them for the win. As Chicago plays very poor defense, we just don't see how they could stop such physically strong players as "King" and "Eyebrow".


ORLANDO MEDŽIK (Points Points (100.5), Tip Less, Odds 1.85)


Since the beginning of the season we have been tracking the number of points of each team, and a sample of six matches is enough to suggest you this bet. Namely, Orlando has not scored 100 points in any games so far, every bet has been “less”, and when it is known that Oklahoma has every time left its opponent with less points from the border, then this simply has to be played.



KEVIN LAV (Points (19.5), Tip Over, Odds 1.85)



Kevin Lav is well into the season - currently not averaging 19.2 points, 15.3 rebounds and 4.3 assists in 49.3% of his shots and a whopping 41.3% for three. In the last two games, the average points have been even higher - 25.5 points, and tonight the Lion could continue at a good pace as Cleveland plays against Boston, which is certainly a better team, but which has big problems with defense on high players. The Lions should be guarded by Gordon Hayward or Jason Tateum, and none of them should physically slow him down so much as to not cross this border.




MALKOLM BROGDON (Points Points (21.5), Tip Over, Odds 1.85)




Another player who has excelled this season is Malcolm Brogdon. He is averaging 22.5 points, 9.7 assists and 5.3 rebounds, so he immediately indicated he would be a boost for Indiana. Best of all, Brogdon can do better - his shot percentage is at 46.9% and up by 34.5%. These are certainly good numbers, but he had a season-high 50.5% and 42.6% for three last year. Tonight the Pacers play against Charlotte. It could be a fast-paced match with plenty of points where Brogdon should go plus again.


SERIES


Charlotte has received less points in the last three games than the set limit. Admittedly, it was on away games, and the limit was even higher than today, which is 109.5 points. Of its six games to date, Indiana has only scored 110 or more points twice. The Pacers are also in a four-game series in which they have scored less than the limit. Three times their opponents have stayed below 100 points, the limit is 107.5 today, and Charlotte has more than scored just twice in six games. He stayed below 100 points three times.
We mentioned in the tip for a bet on Orlando, but let's reiterate - Steve Clifford's team has never scored more points than the set limit in the first six games of the season. Not even at least once he got to 100 points. Each of their games went into fewer total points. Oklahoma has never allowed opponents to score more than the limit. They do not score too much, twice breaking the limit in six matches, and only one of their matches has gone into more total points.
